name: Pucks.io
description:
Pucks.io is online team based physics car soccer.  Drop in and out of 3v3 online matches.  

How to Play Pucks.io

The objective in Pucks.io is similar to Hockey, get as many goals on the opposing team as possible. 

W - to accelerate S - for reverse AD - to steer SPACE - To boost

Pucks.io Strategy

Passing the puck is the most effective way to move it quicky down the ice.  Try boosting right before hitting the ball to give it some extra 'kick'.
